name: uctoplus/uctoplus-php-api
description: Production enviroment is located at `https://moje.uctoplus.sk/api/v3/production`.  Sandbox enviroment is located at `https://moje.uctoplus.sk/api/v3/sandbox`.  All comunication with API is encoded in UTF-8. This REST API is based on Open API v3 standard. For help with implementation or access to the test enviroment please contact our helpdesk
